name: nonradioactive
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not having or producing the dangerous and powerful energy that comes from the breaking up of atoms: They gave her an injection of a nonradioactive substance. Workers were evacuated following a leak of non-radioactive chemicals. Related word
radioactive
More examplesFewer examplesThey were studying a nonradioactive isotope of helium.The material eventually decays into a nonradioactive isotope of lead.The research team developed a nonradioactive way of looking inside the body.A leak of non-radioactive steam killed four workers from the power station.
